comments.body: Since the `if` block below end up with a `return`, the `else` statement is not really useful here. You can just remove it and drop one level of indentation in the rest of the block.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +247,251 @@                    self.module.fail_json(msg="Invalid VLAN %s." % vlan_id_start)
                if not vlan_id_end.isdigit():
                    self.module.fail_json(msg="Invalid VLAN %s." % vlan_id_end)
                vlan_id_start = int(vlan_id_start)
                vlan_id_end = int(vlan_id_end)
